parameters:
\N<Irime>Zozoie... I've heard that name before. Murder, robbery,
rape, he's the worst kind of scumbag who'll do anything.
<ActiveMessage:\C[1]■EV発生■>

\N<Irime>I don't know what happened, but if Rame is feeling sad, then
maybe I'm the only one who can save her as her mother.

\N<Irime>Thinking that... I'm facing the training session. Because I
think so... I can do anything.
A

\N<Irime>I don't know what happened, but if Rame is feeling sad, then
maybe I'm the only one who can save her as her mother.

\N<Irime>With that in mind... I'm facing the training session.
Because I think so... I can do anything.
<ActiveMessage:\C[1]■EV発生■>
\N<Irime>Hey, Segi. What brings you here at this hour?

\N<Segi>Well... I was returning from scouting in Zozoie as Rozaro-
san urged me to. The results were meager, though...

\N<Irime>I don't really want to say this, but your next opponent is
more dangerous than anyone you've faced before. Do you have
any... plans for how to handle it?

\N<Segi>Yes. I heard from Rozaro-san that the usual dazzling tactics
won't work...
\N<Irime>Dazzling, huh? That might indeed be effective.

\N<Segi>But I can't think of a decisive method. Do you have any...
good strategies?

\N<Irime>Hmm... Let's see. It doesn't seem like there's anything
useful at Hojiko's place either...
\N<Segi>...

\N<Irime>Oh right... Whether it's usable or not, there was a strange
creature that emitted a blinding flash of light when I
entered the ruins before. I ran away at that time, but if
you could defeat it, maybe...
\N<Segi>The ruins, you say... Understood.

\N<Irime>Also... it seems to be extremely sensitive to 'sound'. Even
if you manage to reach its lair, you might need something to
lure it out.

\N<Irime>Still, if you're going to fight that thing, take this with
you. It should prove useful.
\N<Segi>What is this...?

\N<Irime>The creature is sensitive to sound. If you use this, it's
bound to create an opening. I think it will definitely be of
help.
\N<Segi>For everything... Thank you very much.
DW_目標設定 Search_for_the_monster_that_Irime_witnessed_in_the_ruins.

\N<Irime>...Whether it's usable or not, I remember there was a
strange monster emitting a weird flash of light when I
entered the ruins before. I ran away at that time, but if we
could defeat it, perhaps...
weather : 0 : 5 : 5 : 15 : 1 : Light_01D : 1
weather : 1 : 5 : 5 : 5 : 1 : Light_01C : 1
<ActiveMessage:\C[1]■EV発生■>

\N<Rame>Lately... I feel like someone's been watching me at the
training grounds and in town... My mother told me it's
called "self-consciousness"...

\N<Rame>But I really do feel like someone is watching me. I wonder
who it could be... It couldn't be Riia-chan, could it?...
A

\N<Rame>Lately... I feel like someone's been watching me at the
training grounds and in town... My mother told me it's
called "self-consciousness"...

\N<Rame>But I really do feel like someone is watching me. I wonder
who it could be... It couldn't be Riia-chan, could it?...
<ActiveMessage:\C[1]■EV発生■>
\N<Irime's Husband>Hey, Miss Segi... Did you come to visit me?
\N<Segi>Yes. How are you feeling?

\N<Irime's Husband>Same as always, lately I've started to feel silly even
worrying about my own health every day...
\N<Segi>...
A

\N<Irime's Husband>I'm as usual, lately it's become rather foolish to worry
about my own health every day...
<ActiveMessage:\C[1]■EV発生■>
\N<Irime's Husband>Hey, Segi-san... Did you come to visit me?
\N<Segi>Yes. How are you feeling?

\N<Irime's Husband>Not too well... But more importantly, there's something I
wanted to ask you.

\N<Segi>What is it? If I can be of any help, please feel free to
ask.
\N<Irime's Husband>Actually... it's about my wife.

\N<Irime's Husband>Is she still attending the training sessions in my place? I
just hope she hasn't encountered anything terrible.
\N<Segi>Well...

\N<Irime's Husband>It's this body, isn't it? My wife, out of concern for me,
doesn't tell me anything.

\N<Irime's Husband>What do you think, Segi-san? Do you know anything about my
wife?

\N<Segi>That... I believe Irime-san doesn't say anything because
there's nothing to worry about. I'm sure there's no reason
for her to be so troubled.

\N<Segi>So please focus on your recovery with peace of mind. That
would be the best reward for Irime-san.
\N<Irime's Husband>I see... Yes, you're right, thank you.

\N<Irime's Husband>Sorry for asking such a strange question. Please forget I
ever mentioned it.
\N<Segi>...Yes.

\N<Segi>(No... that's not true. The truth is different. I'm sure she
also says nothing)

\N<Segi>(Because she doesn't want to cause worry... because she
doesn't want to be a burden)
B
\N<Irime's Husband>I wonder, Miss Segi. Do you know anything about my wife?

\N<Segi>Well... I believe that if Irime isn't talking about it,
there's no need to worry. I'm sure it's not something to be
so concerned about.

\N<Segi>So please rest easy and take care of yourself. That would be
the best reward for Irime, I'm sure.
\N<Irime's Husband>I see... Yes, you're right, thank you.

\N<Irime's Husband>I'm sorry for asking such a strange question. Please forget
I ever mentioned it.
\N<Segi>...Let's send Riia to the training grounds.
